target: I will need the day you plan on arriving.
context: <user>  I want to find a moderately priced place to stay that has at least a 3-star rating <system>  which side of town do you prefer? <user>  Any area is okay as long as the hotel includes free parking. I don't need internet. <system>  Bridge guest house has all that you need, would you like to book that? <user>  yes please book it for 1 <system>  What day would you like ? <user>  3 days and get me phone number, postcode, and address please <system>
